page.title: 07F.L.S. BARBECUE.
page.content: On July 7th the Friends of Longworth School held a barbecue for the fourth year running.Tickets cost 1pound50p for an adult and 1 pound for children. About 150 people came along.To eat we had barbecued chicken and sausages together with various salads that people had donated.For sweet we had strawberries and cream,the strawberries were fresh picked that morning by the Hubbert family.After wards various activities were organised there were rounders, football and a tug of war.We also went swimming in the school pool.It was a great family event and quite cheap.We think the best events were the tug of war and the swimming.It was a hot and sunny day and everybody had a good time.
